title: Pork roast with dried fruits
ingredients: ['1 boneless pork loin roast', '4 tablespoons Dijon mustard', '4 tablespoons dark brown soft sugar, divided', '350ml (12 fl oz) apple juice, divided', '175g (6 oz) pitted prunes', '150g (5 oz) dried apricots', '175ml (6 fl oz) red wine', '1/8 teaspoon ground cloves', '1 dessertspoon cornflour']
